DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the antiemetic efficacy of aprepitant plus palonosetron versus aprepitant plus ramosetron in high risk patients undergoing laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting: Ramosetron Plus Aprepitant vs Palonosetron Plus Aprepitant
DOC.criteria: Non smoking, female patients, scheduled for laparoscopic cholecystectomy Patients with gastrointestinal disorder, Patients with allergies to any study medication, Patients who had received any sedatives, opioid, steroid or antiemetics within 24 h before surgery
